title: Social Issues-Based Science Education Design Using Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific literacy and general comprehension of societal issues
context.additional_context: Experiencing AI-supported instructional design through collaborative action research, exploring educational integration possibilities of socioscientific issues (SSI) and generative AI

learning_goals: Develop two or more instructional materials using generative AI for designing science lessons based on socio-scientific issues (SSI)
Establish critical evaluation criteria for AI-generated content and apply at least three learner-tailored feedback strategies
Share and improve the AI-integrated lesson design process with peer educators through collaborative action research methodology
Implement at least two AI-driven educational strategies to address digital literacy gaps (e.g., enhancing questioning skills, multi-perspective analysis)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
